Name: DataKey
Description: The identification of a storage item

Name: dataFieldSeek
Description: The field that you want to compare to a value

Name: valueSeek
Description: The value that you want to compare

Name: dataField
Description: The field that you want to update the value

Name: value
Description: The new value that you want to update

Name: Notify
Description: You can choose if you want no notify the change to the observer
